thread.title_full: Muslim 'Burkini Babes' compete in their first beach swimming race - after ...

title: Muslim 'Burkini Babes' compete in their first beach swimming race - after ...
text: Muslim 'Burkini Babes' compete in their first beach swimming race - after founding group to defy criticism of their controversial swimwear The group prepared for months in advance for the race in Maroubra on Sunday The burkini has been the subject of international debate after it was banned Yusra Metwally founded the group after the burkini ban in the French Riviera The part bikini, part burqa has allowed the women to swim in open waters Australian designer Aheda Zanetti created the burkini, selling over 700,000
